title: Ok I have something that I worked on that I want to show you guys.
body:
I made my own keycaps. All I did was make Darius' abilities into black and white then inverted them.

Sent the img to the custom keycap website and holy shit they look so good on my cherry back-lit keyboard.

###### sorry for grainy img cheap phone.
https://i.imgur.com/LqH8MmC.jpg
